One of the greatest songs ever created. The song tells the story of a man\'s unrequited love his childhood friend. The story ended tragically. This song made history and records in the Philippines and made way internationally. The melody of the song is still hummed by Filipino\'s everywhere. One of the \"undying songs.\"

The song created by Eraserheads entitled Magasin (Magasin) is a story of a guy who discovered that his childhood friend was now in a cover of a magazine. He was mesmerize because he used to tease the girl and now she is famous and in the cover of the magazine. The chorus of the song states that how he had wished that he hadn\'t seen the magazine because he doesn\'t have enough money to buy it and have her beautiful face.
